value_i18n.ar_SA:
This campaign in a box is designed for Liferay partners to use in their lead generation efforts and  contains ready-to-use marketing assets for a platform campaign.

While the campaign’s primary theme is "Do More with Less," there are two key messages that you can focus on with prospects:

value_i18n.ar_SA: At Liferay, we provide organizations with a single platform to reach all their key users. There is no need to buy multiple software platforms. Liferay can help you reach your customers, employees, partners, and suppliers. We provide you with the capability to build the unique connections you need, all with one easy-to-use tool box.
